app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Voice Translate Translator
app_description: Hello Translator is a simple and efficient translation software. When you are at work traveling abroad meeting with foreign friends solve your language barriers overseas business travel and support easily translate over 60 kinds of languages. Core Function: 1. Text translation: input text you can get high quality translation 2. Camera translation: translate text in images instantly support camera taken and album selection. Map. Menus books street signs and etc take photos and get translation results in time 3. Real time speech translation: real time two way speech translation making communication easier and more convenient 4. Simultaneous interpretation: simple and fast while speaking and translating We will offer in app purchases for the advanced version of Translate and you can also enjoy a free trial period based on your chosen plan. The relevant fees will be deducted from your iTunes account and will vary by country. Your free trial subscription will automatically renew as a paid subscription unless the automatic renewal is closed at least 24 hours prior to the end of the free trial period. You can turn off automatic renewal by iTunes account settings and cancel the free trial or subscription at any time. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. Cancellation will take effect after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be downgraded to a free service. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will be renewed.
